title: Biofilm Assay
author: Opentrons
description:
This protocol performs a custom biofilm assay using distilled H2O, crystal violet for staining, and 70% ethanol for final hydration. The assay is carried out after a user-defined incubation at 37˚C using the Opentrons temperature module.



Sarstedt 96-flat well plate 200ul
Axygen 1-channel reservoirs 240ml #11380275
Sarstedt 300ul tipracks # 70.760.002
Opentrons temperature module with aluminum plate
Opentrons P300 multi-channel electronic pipette
process:
Input the mount side for your P300 multi-channel pipette and the number of samples to run.
Download your protocol.
Upload your protocol into the OT App.
Set up your deck according to the deck map.
Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our support articles.
Hit "Run".
notes: If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact the Protocol Development Team by filling out the Troubleshooting Survey.

markdown.title: Biofilm Assay
markdown.author: [Opentrons](https://opentrons.com/)
markdown.description:
This protocol performs a custom biofilm assay using distilled H2O, crystal violet for staining, and 70% ethanol for final hydration. The assay is carried out after a user-defined incubation at 37˚C using the Opentrons temperature module.

---
![Materials Needed](https://s3.amazonaws.com/opentrons-protocol-library-website/custom-README-images/001-General+Headings/materials.png)

* Sarstedt 96-flat well plate 200ul
* [Axygen 1-channel reservoirs 240ml #11380275](https://www.fishersci.co.uk/shop/products/axygen-single-well-high-profile-reagent-reservoirs-8/11380275)
* Sarstedt 300ul tipracks # 70.760.002
* [Opentrons temperature module](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/hardware-modules/products/tempdeck) with [aluminum plate](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/hardware-modules/products/aluminum-block-set)
* [Opentrons P300 multi-channel electronic pipette](https://shop.opentrons.com/collections/ot-2-pipettes/products/8-channel-electronic-pipette)

---
markdown.process:
1. Input the mount side for your P300 multi-channel pipette and the number of samples to run.
2. Download your protocol.
3. Upload your protocol into the [OT App](https://opentrons.com/ot-app).
4. Set up your deck according to the deck map.
5. Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our [support articles](https://support.opentrons.com/en/collections/1559720-guide-for-getting-started-with-the-ot-2).
6. Hit "Run".
markdown.notes: If you have any questions about this protocol, please contact the Protocol Development Team by filling out the [Troubleshooting Survey](https://protocol-troubleshooting.paperform.co/).
